text:
RELIGION

Balathandayuthabani Swamy Temple: Thaipoosa Thiruvizha, Sukkiravaarappettai, 10 a.m.

Subramaniya Swamy Temple: Thaipoosa Thiruvizha-Thiruveethi Ulaa & Spiritual Discourse,

Marudhamalai, 10 a.m.

Asthiga Samajam: Nama Prachara Vaibhavam, VRG Thirumana Mandapam, Edayarpalayam, 9 a.m.

Rathina Vinayakar Temple: Pradosham, R.S. Puram, 4.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Kovai Kalaimagal College of Arts and Science: Seminar on ‘Impact is all positive’, CIMAT Auditorium,

2 p.m.

Indian Texpreneurs Federation: Programme on Strategies for growth, Hotel Le Meridian, 6 p.m.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Two-day programme on first aid, Vyshnav Building,

Race Course, 9 a.m.

Sankara Institute of Management Science: Online share trading programme,

Dhanam Hall, 10.30 a.m.

Sree Dharmasastha Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Kids meet, school grounds,

8.30 a.m.

C.M.S. Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Annual Sports Day, school ground,

3.30 p.m.

Dermacon 2016: Inaugural function of Dermacon 2016, Codissia Hall A,

6 p.m.

World Vision India: Urban Child Protection and Participation Project,

Damodharan Hall, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Certification programme on Mobile Application Development for UG students,

CIMAT Lab, college premises,

9.30 a.m.

PSG Techs Coe Indutech: Inauguration of Centre of Excellence for Industrial/Home Textiles, Le Meridian Hotel, Neelambur, 11.30 a.m.

Kalaignar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: Entrepreneurship awareness camp, KIT Campus, 9 a.m.

Kurinji Hospital: Continuing medical education programme,

Conference Hall-Kurinji Hospital,

2 p.m.

V.L.B. Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Lecture on ‘E-Commerce-The Business Mantra’, conference hall, 2 p.m.

Sree Narayana Guru College: General health and eye check-up camp for staff members,

conference hall, 10 a.m.

PALLADAM

The Southern Indian Mills Association: Inauguration of textile workers hostel and apparel manufacturing unit of Bannari Amman Spinning Mills Limited by Union Minister of State Santhosh Kumar Gangwar,

Hi-tech Weaving Park,

2.15 p.m.
title: Coimbatore today
